entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is described as staggering to his feet and looking around after the Headless Hunt has passed.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is Harry's friend who was supposed to be going back into the Room of Requirement.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who gets to his feet and looks around after the Headless Hunt has passed.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's friend who gets to her feet and suggests sticking together.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a character who remains slumped on the corridor floor without a wand.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is a character who remains slumped on the corridor floor without a wand.

entities.name: headless hunt
entities.description: The Headless Hunt is an event that has passed and caused Harry to stagger.

entities.name: room of requirement
entities.description: The Room of Requirement is a location where Ginny was supposed to be going back into.

relationships.description: Harry is searching for Ginny, who was supposed to be going back into the Room of Requirement.
Ron is looking into whether the Room of Requirement will still work after the fire.
Hermione is advising Harry to stick together with her and Ron.
Malfoy and Goyle are associated with each other, as they remain slumped on the corridor floor together.
